test_cases.question: Which film starring Keanu Reeves as Neo was released first?
test_cases.ground_truth: The Matrix (1999) was released before The Matrix Reloaded (2003) and The Matrix Revolutions (2003).

test_cases.question: The band that performed 'Comfortably Numb' formed in which city?
Who was the director of the movie that features the character Sarah Connor?
test_cases.ground_truth: James Cameron directed The Terminator (1984) and Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).
